replies.body: This makes me wish i had a computer capable of playing on graphics higher then low.
I heard this was going to be more optimized so you should be able to. *Don't quote me on that*

"this was going to be more optimized so you should be able to" -Broheen 2014
Sorry I really had to.
screen shotting and bringing this back up in a year

I'll also refer to this quote if anyone asks me about it.

“You know, Broheen said.”
"The new summoner's rift is so optimized, you can play it on a potato" - Broheen 2014
"The new potato is so optimized, you can play it on Summoner's rift" - Broheen 2014
"Summoner's Rift is a potato" - Broheen 2014
"Potato" - Broheen 2014

This community is brilliant sometimes. 
{{champion:74}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:74}}

Nothing. we are just quoting him!: ) not making fun of him! ^.^
Nothing,we are just quoting him!:) not making fun of him! ^.^ - Mrs. Sweeteepie 2014
If you haven't yet turn off shadows. It helps a lot, the shadows are super graphics intensive I play on high quality without shadows at 80 fps and when I turn on medium shadows I drop to 25-30 fps.
Best part is, you don't have to deal with {{champion:238}}  anymore.
{{champion:238}} isn't satisfied just taking your life. He must also have your fps.
The new map has lesser polygons so it'll run even better than the previous one. Don't worry Riot will optimize it.

Hey, just because its a lesser polygon doesn't mean its less important, and doesnt need as much RAM as the old one.  No matter the status of the polygon, it cant change who it is, and giving it less RAM because of it is pure discrimination.  RITO PLS FIX THIS RACIST HATRED OF LESSER POLYGONS NOW.{{item:3070}}
Since when did tumblr find out about league?
This guy.... So much win.....
